snippet: Louisville has suspended Lonnie Galloway for the Citrus Bowl following a review of how the co-offensive coordinator handled Wake Forest game plans he received from fired Demon Deacons broadcaster Tommy Elrod....
lead_paragraph: Louisville has suspended Lonnie Galloway for the Citrus Bowl following a review of how the co-offensive coordinator handled Wake Forest game plans he received from fired Demon Deacons broadcaster Tommy Elrod.

headline.main: Louisville Suspends Assistant After Wake Forest Probe
headline.print_headline: Louisville Suspends Assistant After Wake Forest Probe
